caption.title: Results from the deterministic sensitivity analysis.
caption.p: Partial rank correlation coefficients (PRCCs) and 95% confidence intervals for η (per sex act transmission probability), p (frequency of sex acts), q (proportion of the convalescent individuals who are male and sexually active), and 1/ α (convalescent period), as well as the reproductive number R 0. (A) Sensitivity of the duration and size of the epidemic on changes of parameters. (B) Sensitivity of the timing and daily incidence of symptomatic cases, I, at the peak of the epidemic on changes of parameters.
Click here for additional data file.
